thread.title: Facebook Community Help Will Connect People With Assistance During Emergencies

author: Nathan Olivarez-Giles
title: Facebook Community Help Will Connect People With Assistance During Emergencies

organizations.name: facebook community help will connect people with assistance during emergencies facebook inc.

text:
Facebook Inc.â€™s Safety Check has become a significant tool within its namesake social network, helping people find out if their friends and family are safe in situations of widespread emergency, such as terrorist attacks or floods. Now, Facebook is expanding Safety Check to offer help to people who are not safe.

On Wednesday, it announced Community Help, a Safety Check feature that connects people in need with urgent resources such...
